entry.source: Our leader, Mistress Amaterasu, has been{F801}sealed away by demons who want to take Tokyo{F801}for themselves. We, the Amatsugami, have lost{F801}much of our power. Please collect the three{F801}vessels of our god and bring them to {F804,5}Meiji{F801}Shrine{F804,0} {F804,5}south{F804,0} of {F804,5}Shinjuku{F804,0} so we can revive her.{F801}
